About Us

Transform your operations with our technology &
business expertise and scalable IT outsourcing solutions.

About US

Diptimates Consultants

Diptimate Consultants Private Limited (DCPL) is an emerging IT enabling company with its LEG-IT (LEG denotes “Legal” & IT denotes Information technology; both are taken care with its macro meaning) concept patronage. It is a startup of a Chartered Accountant creating real solutions for MSME & Primary sector industries & creating jobs for youth through its LEG-IT thought process.

Our motto “Creating Solutions for hafting the Golden bird “AKA INDIA”” provoke us for hunting problems of Primary & MSME sector industries and do research & development for providing best possible solution at rational cost so that they remain internationally competitive & available.

Our Mission

With a single ERP mechanism in process management & standardization of MSME and Primary sector industries, company will provide a digital platform where the interest of MSME & Primary sector industries will be safeguarded. All such MSME and Primary sector industries shall be law compliant & be contributory in nation building. With better governance mechanism of MSME and Primary sector industries, real haft shall be placed in UP state building & Nation building.

Our Vision

DCPL will be Epitome of virtual & physical convenient consulting company enriching all stakeholders connected with MSME & Primary sector industries, by delivering best quality solutions at affordable prices without hustle and delay.

Why Us

We have groomed numerous big companies in building the upright website to communicate their value proposition. If you’re searching for reliable web/app development and eCommerce website designing company with rich experience and advanced industry knowledge, then we have a team of dedicated veterans who are eligible to cater to the different needs of our various clients. We know how hard it is to entrust your business in other hands which makes us thrive for excellence not just for our brand but for your Trust. Our team works consistently to grow and set high bars to complete with the current market trends.

Employee Value

Employees are precious asset to DCPL. They are human being not machines for DCPL. DCPL believes in qualitative output & better efficiency rather availability at office premise at peak hours.

Social Value

All the in-house products & job-work assignments at DCPL first go through test that whether the result will be in any way benefit to the society; if yes… then only DCPL work for it.

Customer Value

We implement all the steps of SDLC, rather saying “yes” for everything to convert the lead into client.

Nation Value

With better MSME & Primary sector industries governance mechanism, real haft shall be placed in UP state building & Nation building.

We are LEG-IT Team!

We are a team of multi-professional like people having qualification of Chartered Accountancy, Company Secretary, Cost Accountancy, Advocacy, Doctor, Architect, Real-Estate planner, B-tech, BCA, M-tech & many more.

This reduces the "Gap" between the coder & business mindset resulting in efficient & effective software providing best values to them for business management and operations. We focus with our full strength so that we could never be cost to customer but be a profit center.

With this Leg-It concept & systematic approach of execution of work, we are one of the best service providers in race of IT services provider.
